16.post_text: Listen to the whole podcast to discover more on the launch of the #Ferrari 308 GT4: http://bit.ly/Podcast_308GT4 #Ferrari70

comments.message: One of the ugliest Ferrari ever......just behind the Mondail

Il n'y a que ce qui ne connaissent pas qui jugent...
Très bonne voiture , qui donne énormément de plaisir...
Il est vrai que le design Bertone était très différent de Pininfarina ( ce qui en a choqué beaucoup , mais elle a son look )

Dear team of Ferrari, the 308 GT4 was produced from 1974 through 1980, not just till 1978! The first series between 1974 and 1976 was labelled "Dino", and the second series between 1976 and 1980 was labelled "Ferrari". The name change didn't take place at the end of 1976, but in mid-season. The exterior and interior designs plus the options were slightly modified during the change from Series I to Series II.

A very underrated Ferrari & a more daring design than the 308GTB, which was little more than a watered down retro take on the original Dino. The interior in particular is fabulous & it has one of the best dashboard layouts of any Ferrari. I say let the snobs keep on knocking it. It's their loss...
